level.heading: APPLICATION OF CARRYOUT REQUIREMENTS TO RETAIL ESTABLISHMENTS SELLING BOTH FOODND NON-FOOD ITEMS (ยง 21-1004) The disposable carryout bag fee, and material and labeling requirements of thishapter, shall apply to a disposable carryout bag provided with the purchase ofny item from a retail establishment subject to this chapter, even if the items a non-food item. Source: Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 7208, 7211 (August 13, 2010).
